column3: Traffic;Kandal:------ An accident occurred at 8:45 pm on December 06
column8: Vanrec Co. collided with a motorbike. Three people died suddenly at the scene.------23-year-old Ngor Kok
column10: a 33 year old and Sam Makara
column11: a 30 year old were on a Honda Dream. The driver of the bus is unknown.------The motorcyclist was not paying attention and the bus was reported to have been speeding------After the incident
column12: the authority measured and handed over the bodies to the families. The evidence will be kept at the Kien Svay district police inspector’s office to build a case file. ------POST NEWS
